mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT MEMBER_NO, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_ENROLL_DATE, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, BOARD_NO FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO AS COMMENT_NO, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT b.BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD b WHERE bc.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) AS PARENT_TITLE, 'BOARD' AS COMMENT_TYPE FROM BOARD_COMMENT bc UNION SELECT MEDIA_COMMENT_NO AS COMMENT_NO, MEDIA_COMMENT_CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(MEDIA_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT m.MEDIA_TITLE FROM MEDIA m WHERE mc.MEDIA_NO = m.MEDIA_NO) AS PARENT_TITLE, 'MEDIA' AS COMMENT_TYPE FROM MEDIA_COMMENT mc )

SELECT BOARD_COMMENT_NO AS COMMENT_NO, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, BOARD_COMMENT_CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(BOARD_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT b.BOARD_CONTENT FROM BOARD b WHERE bc.BOARD_NO = b.BOARD_NO) AS PARENT_TITLE, 'BOARD' AS COMMENT_TYPE FROM BOARD_COMMENT bc JOIN MEMBER m ON bc.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO
UNION
SELECT MEDIA_COMMENT_NO AS COMMENT_NO, m.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEDIA_COMMENT_CONTENT AS COMMENT_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(MEDIA_COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE, (SELECT m.MEDIA_TITLE FROM MEDIA m WHERE mc.MEDIA_NO = m.MEDIA_NO) AS PARENT_TITLE, 'MEDIA' AS COMMENT_TYPE FROM MEDIA_COMMENT mc JOIN MEMBER m ON mc.MEMBER_NO = m.MEMBER_NO
ORDER BY COMMENT_ENROLL_DATE DESC
SELECT ARTIST_GROUP_NO, MEMBER_NO, ARTIST_GROUP_TITLE, ARTIST_GROUP_PROFILE FROM ARTIST_SUBSCRIBE JOIN ARTIST_GROUP USING( ARTIST_GROUP_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE_LIST JOIN PURCHASE USING (PURCHASE_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT PURCHASE_LIST_NO ,PURCHASE_NO ,PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_QUANTITY , PURCHASE_LIST_NO, MEMBER_NO, PURCHASE_STATUS ,PURCHASE_DATE , PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_IMAGE, PURCHASE_PRICE FROM PURCHASE_LIST JOIN PURCHASE p USING (PURCHASE_NO) JOIN PRODUCT p2 USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
